entry.title: Mint and Pomegranade
entry.summary:
Author: PresidentHao

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 107,096Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 196

Summary: Damian could not believe that even after six years of trying to catch her he had not achieved anything; not the slightest trace of her identity, her lair or her plans, being even difficult to find the traces of her wanderings when these were not covered by the trail of blood she dragged with her.To prove his worth as Robin and gain his father's lost trust, he will once again descend into the depths of his origins, not counting that he would end up in a situation that would take him deeper into the darkness of Gotham than he could have imagined.
